snippet: The Florida Supreme Court on Thursday struck down a state law that placed a $1 million limit on the amount of money people can be awarded in wrongful death cases caused by medical malpractice....

headline.print_headline: Florida Supreme Court Voids Caps on Medical Malpractice Lawsuits
headline.main: Florida Supreme Court Voids Caps on Medical Malpractice Lawsuits

lead_paragraph: The Florida Supreme Court on Thursday struck down a state law that placed a $1 million limit on the amount of money people can be awarded in wrongful death cases caused by medical malpractice.
